#include<stdio.h>
#define max(a,b) (a>b?a:b)
#define min(a,b) (a<b?a:b)
int main()
{
    int t,r1[4],r2[4],i,j;
    scanf("%d",&t);
 
    while(t--)
    {
        for(i=0;i<4;i++)
        scanf("%d",&r1[i]);
 
        for(i=0;i<4;i++)
        scanf("%d",&r2[i]);
 
        int a1,a2,a3,l,b;
        a1=((r1[2]-r1[0])*(r1[3]-r1[1]));
 
        a2=((r2[2]-r2[0])*(r2[3]-r2[1]));
 
        a3=a1+a2;
 
        int r3[4];
 
        r3[0]=max(r1[0],r2[0]);
        r3[1]=max(r1[1],r2[1]);
        r3[2]=min(r1[2],r2[2]);
        r3[3]=min(r1[3],r2[3]);
 
        if((r3[2]>r3[0])&&(r3[3]>r3[1]))
        a3-=((r3[2]-r3[0])*(r3[3]-r3[1]));

    }return 0;
}
